long_description: Thanks to its remote connection to the fuel canister, the hose-mounted Primus Eta Spider Stove has a lower center of gravity than standard stacked stoves for extra stability while cooking. Eta Spider Stove includes burner, 1-liter pot, windscreen, plastic bowl for eating and serving, and a nylon carry bag for easy transport. Stove connects remotely to an isobutane gas canister (not included). Primus Eta stoves achieve 40% greater fuel efficiency than standard stoves, letting you cook longer with less fuel. Piezo igniter sparks the stove to life with the push of a button, eliminating worries about wet matches or burning your hand. 1-liter pot features heat-resistant silicone foldout handles and an integrated spout for easy pouring. Pot lid is made from BPA-free plastic and features an integrated colander. For the best fuel economy, turn the throttle approximately three-quarters of the way open.
short_description: Thanks to its remote connection to the fuel canister, the hose-mounted Primus Eta Spider Stove has a lower center of gravity than standard stacked stoves for extra stability while cooking.
